game.name: Truck Trials
game.description:
Can you deal with all of these intense obstacles-filled courses? Each course is filled with long gaps, barriers, crushed cars, explosives and other unwanted stuff that are lying on your way to wreck your monster truck. Before getting started on the high challenges, it is important for you to select a super awesome rig in this free online racing game. Truck Trials game is a completely new HTML5 truck driving game incorporated with eye catchy graphics and user-friendly design. Have fun with this easy-to-play monster truck game!

This cool side-scrolling driving game provides you with a wonderful opportunity to drive a beautifully-designed monster truck through the tough obstacles. Do not try to become a kind person, smash anything that comes on your way in order to reach the finish line in this flash game. With beating every level, you will be able to unlock better and bigger trucks and enjoy your truck riding in the optimum possible way. This hardcore monster truck driving game is full of destruction and explosions.Â 

Do not forget to collect sacks of cash while driving your vehicle through the extremely hazardous tracks to obtain a higher score. Book your seat in an advanced truck, to complete more advanced work, larger trailers, longer load and more valuable goods! Collect all the bags of stars while navigating your power truck towards the completion of each level. Avoid crashing or tipping over and make sure you will earn a top place on the leaderboard.

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Truck Trials at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Truck  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: monster truck games, truck racing, monster truck racing games
game.mobileControlKeys: L ICONS TO BALANCE, RIGHT ICON TO L-R MOVE
game.webControlKeys: SPACE- BREAK, UP ARROW- SPEED, DOWN - BACK, L-R ARROWS TO BALANCE
